instructions.da: Drej til venstresving videre ad Cool highway
instructions.en: Turn left to stay on Cool highway

instructions.es-ES: Cruce a la izquierda en Cool highway
instructions.fr: Tourner à gauche pour rester Cool highway
instructions.he: פנה שמאלה כדי להישאר בCool highway
instructions.it: Gira a sinistra per stare su Cool highway
instructions.pl: Skręć w lewo, aby pozostać na Cool highway

instructions.pt-PT: Vire à esquerda para se manter em Cool highway

instructions.tr: Cool highway üzerinde kalmak için sol yöne dön
